body:
PLEASE NOTE: Nothing in here is confirmed or even planned. I just want to know how many people would be signing up and if anyone would be interested in helping us come up with a prize pool.

Survey:
https://goo.gl/forms/In3eKp2qkjVQW0AY2


I can't stress enough, nothing is planned or confirmed. I just want to know numbers and if anyone would be interested in helping out.

How it would work:
There would be a crowd funded Prize pool for Tournament 5. I can't confirm any details except that the top 3 teams would recieve something from this prize pool. The officials and myself are also more than willing to start up the crowd fund with some of our own donations. Like I said I just want to know if anyone would be interested so, if we did decide to make a prize pool, then we could plan it out. If your interested please fill out the survey.


Since this post is only an informational post I'm locking it. Feel free to dm me on discord if you have any questions.

title: Survey for Tournament 5
